knimeNode.name: Linear Regression (Predictor)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Predicts the response using a linear regression model.

fullDescription.intro: Predicts the response using a linear regression model. The node needs to be connected to a linear regression node model and some test data. It is only executable if the test data contains the columns that are used by the learner model. This node appends a new column to the input table containing the prediction for each row. Note, this node doesn't have a dialog.

ports.inPort: Model from the linear regression learner node.
ports.outPort: Table from input with an additional prediction column.
